count.title: Count
count.description: Number of hash marks to generate

container.title: Container
container.description:
This is either "leftDecoration" or "rightDecoration",
to indicate whether this rule goes to the left or to the right of the slider.
Note that on RTL system, "leftDecoration" would actually go to the right, and vice-versa.

ruleStyle.title: Rule Style
ruleStyle.description: CSS style to apply to individual hash marks

title.value: A widget to transfer values through source and target Wires

description.value: This widget represents a controller task to transfer a value from a source to a target, through a source and a target Wires, when an event (a function) or a topic is issued. If this widget has child ChildWire widgets, their _addWire() methods are called to add Wire arguments to a source or a target Wire.
